# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special price considering our mutual interests. My offer for the product is $1,200,000. I believe this price strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to see it go to someone who appreciates it as much as I do. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction. If you have any questions or need more information, please feel free to reach out. Sincerely, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000.
